name: Ryudamon
effect: [On Play] Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Add 1 card with [X-Antibody] in its traits and 1 [Yuji Musya] among them to your hand. Place the remaining cards at the bottom of your deck in any order.
digivolve_effect: [All Turns] While this Digimon has [X-Antibody] in its traits, it gains ＜Decoy (Black)＞. (When one of your other black Digimon would be deleted by an opponent's effect, you may delete this Digimon to prevent that deletion.)
